abstract: Mr. Cuomo and Mr. McCall have grown to be allies since their bitter primary battle a decade ago, which, at the time, looked as if it dealt a fatal blow to Mr. Cuomo's political career.
snippet: Mr. Cuomo and Mr. McCall have grown to be allies since their bitter primary battle a decade ago, which, at the time, looked as if it dealt a fatal blow to Mr. Cuomo's political career.
lead_paragraph: ALBANY - Gov. Andrew M. Cuomo, coming full circle a decade after his disastrous first bid to win the Democratic nomination for governor, on Monday appointed the man who bested him, former State Comptroller H. Carl McCall, to lead the board of trustees for the State University of New York.

headline.main: Cuomo Names McCall, a Former Rival, to Lead the SUNY Board
